revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.7.1)
revision.text:
{{GA|18:11, 23 December 2013 (UTC)|topic=Agriculture, food and drink|page=1|oldid=587404877}} {{WikiProject Food and drink |class=GA |importance=low |Foodservice=yes |b1=yes |b2=yes |b3=yes |b4=yes |b5=yes |b6=yes}} {{dyktalk|10 February|2014|entry= ... that the '''[[BK grilled chicken sandwiches|Burger King grilled chicken sandwich]]''' ''(pictured)'' has been reformulated several times since its introduction in 1990?}} {{bk talk}} == Scratchpad == * name="CT-BK Broiler" {{cite web|last=Ryan|first=Nancy|title=Versatile Chicken Takes Turn On Grill|url=http://articles.chicagotribune.com/1990-10-15/business/9003260402_1_fried-chicken-low-fat-items-grilled|work=Chicago Tribune|accessdate=19 November 2013|date=15 October 1990}} ==GA1== {{Talk:BK grilled chicken sandwiches/GA1}} [[User:Zanimum|Zanimum]] ([[User talk:Zanimum|talk]] '''·''' [[Special:Contributions/Zanimum|contribs]]) 20:42, 26 November 2013 (UTC) == Move == The full proper name should be used not the acronym which is not a COMMONNAME either. Ie- move to "Burger King..."([[User:Lihaas|Lihaas]] ([[User talk:Lihaas|talk]]) 16:02, 2 February 2014 (UTC)). :[[BK]] - Like the link? --[[User:Jerem43|Jeremy]] ([[User talk:Jerem43|blah blah]] • [[Special:Contributions/Jerem43|I did it!]]) 06:16, 3 February 2014 (UTC) == Requested move ==
:''The following discussion is an archived discussion of a [[WP:requested moves|requested move]]. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on the talk page. Editors desiring to contest the closing decision should consider a [[Wikipedia:move review|move review]]. No further edits should be made to this section. '' The result of the move request was: '''move to [[Burger King grilled chicken sandwiches]]'''. There is a clear consensus to retain the plural. [[User:Armbrust|Armbrust]] [[User talk:Armbrust|The Homunculus]] 15:00, 18 February 2014 (UTC) ---- [[:BK grilled chicken sandwiches]] → {{no redirect|Burger King grilled chicken sandwich}} – I am recommending two changes to this article's title: 1) plural to singular and 2) abbreviation to full phrase. I recommend the singular form because of [[Wikipedia:Naming conventions (plurals)|our naming conventions with respect to plurals]], which state that "Wikipedia articles should have singular titles." I recommend switching "BK" to "Burger King" for several reasons. Firstly, it is more consistent with the title of the main article, [[Burger King]]. Secondly, this article's title is a common noun phrase, not a proper noun phrase like [[BK Chicken Fries]], and therefore the existence of an official or marketing name does not apply here. Thirdly, [[Wikipedia:Article_titles#Use_commonly_recognizable_names|our policy on article titles]] tells us to use commonly recognizable names, and spelling out "Burger King" makes the title more recognizable. Furthermore, a Google Books search reveals more hits for "Burger King grilled chicken sandwich" than for "BK grilled chicken sandwich". [[User:Neelix|Neelix]] ([[User talk:Neelix|talk]]) 04:29, 11 February 2014 (UTC) *'''Support''' the abbreviation should definitely be expanded -- [[Special:Contributions/70.24.244.161|70.24.244.161]] ([[User talk:70.24.244.161|talk]]) 05:32, 11 February 2014 (UTC) *'''Rename''' to [[Burger King grilled chicken sandwiches]]. The abbreviation should be expanded, but the article covers a range of sandwiches, so the plural form shoukd be retained. --[[User:BrownHairedGirl|BrownHairedGirl]] [[User talk:BrownHairedGirl|(talk)]] • ([[Special:Contributions/BrownHairedGirl|contribs]]) 10:03, 11 February 2014 (UTC) *'''Only support BrownHairedGirl's proposal'''. The plural should be kept. [[User:Red Slash|Red ]][[User talk:Red Slash|Slash]] 04:05, 12 February 2014 (UTC) *'''Support''' either way, but favor keeping the plural. [[User:BD2412|'''''bd2412''''']] [[User talk:BD2412|'''T''']] 02:52, 16 February 2014 (UTC) :''The above discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[WP:RM|requested move]]. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on this talk page or in a [[WP:move review|move review]]. No further edits should be made to this section.
== Hatnote == The hatnote linking to [[Burger King products]] and [[List of Burger King products]] should be removed from this article. [[Wikipedia:Hatnote#Linking_to_articles_that_are_related_to_the_topic|Our guideline regarding hatnotes that link to articles that are related to the topic]] makes it clear that such links are an improper use of hatnotes. [[User:Neelix|Neelix]] ([[User talk:Neelix|talk]]) 17:58, 15 February 2014 (UTC) :The section you link to is in regards to disambiguation hat notes (''Disambiguation hatnotes are intended to link to separate topics that could be referred to by the same title''). This links back to the two parent articles that are in [[WP:SS|summary style]], [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Hatnote#.22Main_article:_.E2.80.A6.22 as listed here]. --[[User:Jerem43|Jeremy]] ([[User talk:Jerem43|blah blah]] • [[Special:Contributions/Jerem43|I did it!]]) 21:00, 15 February 2014 (UTC) ::The guideline about the "main" link you mention is about putting links in subsections linking to subarticles, not as hatnotes at the top of articles linking to parent articles. [[Wikipedia:Hatnote]] is explicitly against placing these links at the top of articles. [[User:Neelix|Neelix]] ([[User talk:Neelix|talk]]) 16:56, 16 February 2014 (UTC) == Picture of Tendergrill is not reflective of current product == I don't know the procedure and rules for getting a new photo in (I don't have a pic myself) but I just was at Burger King and the Tendergrill I got matches the picture on their website which shows a brioche style bun that doesn't at all resemble the one at the top of this article. [http://www.bk.com/menu-item/tendergrill-chicken-sandwich Link to BK product page] [[User:Cransdell|Cransdell]] ([[User talk:Cransdell|talk]]) 16:36, 28 October 2015 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:5|one external link|5 external links}} on [[Burger King grilled chicken sandwiches]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=748871439 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120516003235/http://www2.prnewswire.com/cgi-bin/stories.pl?ACCT=104&STORY=/www/story/05-23-2002/0001734302&EDATE= to http://www2.prnewswire.com/cgi-bin/stories.pl?ACCT=104&STORY=/www/story/05-23-2002/0001734302&EDATE= *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20111130021015/http://www.businessweek.com/bwdaily/dnflash/apr2002/nf2002049_3504.htm to http://www.businessweek.com/bwdaily/dnflash/apr2002/nf2002049_3504.htm *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120322210547/http://www.cspinet.org/new/200208211_print.html to http://www.cspinet.org/new/200208211_print.html *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120516003441/http://www2.prnewswire.com/cgi-bin/stories.pl?ACCT=104&STORY=/www/story/07-01-2002/0001756551&EDATE= to http://www2.prnewswire.com/cgi-bin/stories.pl?ACCT=104&STORY=/www/story/07-01-2002/0001756551&EDATE= *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20060721142410/http://www.bk.com/Nutrition/PDFs/brochure.pdf to http://www.bk.com/Nutrition/PDFs/brochure.pdf When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 21:55, 10 November 2016 (UTC)
